| Property   | Attribute  | Description | Type                                                                                                   | Default                 |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------- |

| `disabled` | `disabled` |             | `boolean`                                                                                              | `false`                 |
| `size`     | `size`     |             | `ButtonSize.Large \| ButtonSize.Regular \| ButtonSize.Small \| ButtonSize.XLarge \| ButtonSize.XSmall` | `ButtonSize.Regular`    |
